properties.entry: SELECT MN_NO , MN_ID , MN_PWD , MN_NICKNAME , MN_NAME , MN_EMAIL , MN_PHONE , MN_JOIN , MN_QUIT , ACTIVATION FROM MANAGER_INFO WHERE MN_ID = ? AND MN_PWD = ? AND ACTIVATION = 'N'
SELECT MN_NO , MN_ID , MN_PWD , MN_NICKNAME , MN_NAME , MN_EMAIL , MN_PHONE , MN_JOIN , NVL(TO_CHAR(MN_QUIT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '-') "MN_QUIT" , ACTIVATION FROM MANAGER_INFO
INSERT INTO MANAGER_INFO ( MN_NO , MN_ID , MN_PWD , MN_NAME , MN_EMAIL , MN_PHONE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ADNO.NEXTVAL , 'admin'||LPAD(SEQ_ADIDNO.NEXTVAL,2,0) , ? , ? , ?||'@highfive.team' , ? )
SELECT MN_NO , MN_ID , MN_NAME , MN_EMAIL , MN_PHONE , MN_JOIN , NVL(TO_CHAR(MN_QUIT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '-') "MN_QUIT" , ACTIVATION FROM MANAGER_INFO WHERE MN_NO = ?
UPDATE MANAGER_INFO SET MN_PWD = ? , MN_NAME = ? , MN_EMAIL = ? , MN_PHONE = ? WHERE MN_NO = ?
